# dbt_cloud_job (Resource)


## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "dbt_cloud_job" "test" {
  project_id     = 101
  environment_id = 1
  name           = "Test job"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- **project_id** (Integer)
- **environment_id** (Integer)
- **name** (String)

### Optional


## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

```shell
terraform import dbt_cloud_job.example_job name
```
